RICHARD R. PALKIMAS v. RITA J. LAVINE Richard H. G. Cunningham, in support of the petition. John B. Farley, James V. Somers, John W. Dietz and Erik J. Ness, in opposition. Decided December 4, 2002

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
